name: EMCORE Corporation
description: EMCORE Corporation is a leading provider of advanced mixed-signal optics and photonic solutions. Founded in 1984 and headquartered in Alhambra, California, EMCORE specializes in the design and manufacture of optoelectronic products for the telecommunications, aerospace, defense, and industrial markets. The company is well-known for its innovative technologies in fiber optics, including high-performance optical components, systems, and subsystems. EMCORE's product portfolio includes fiber optic transceivers, passive optical components, and advanced photonic solutions for a variety of applications, from high-speed data transmission to satellite communications. The company's commitment to quality and technological advancement has positioned it as a key player in the rapidly evolving optics and photonics industry, serving both commercial and military customers. EMCORE's mission is to deliver cutting-edge products that enhance connectivity and performance in optical networks and systems, while also driving advancements in emerging technologies such as 5G and IoT.
